timeline.body:
This is not the correct copyright header I'm afraid. It should be this:
```

/*******************************************************************************
 * Copyright (c) 2020 Eclipse RDF4J contributors.
 * All rights reserved. This program and the accompanying materials
 * are made available under the terms of the Eclipse Distribution License v1.0
 * which accompanies this distribution, and is available at
 * http://www.eclipse.org/org/documents/edl-v10.php.
 *******************************************************************************/
```

See https://github.com/eclipse/rdf4j/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-formatting for details.

timeline.author: jeenbroekstra

timeline.body: No big dealm but there's no need to update copyright years in existing files. We never update these: they reflect the year the file was first created, not when it was last edited.
timeline.bodyText: No big dealm but there's no need to update copyright years in existing files. We never update these: they reflect the year the file was first created, not when it was last edited.

timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,5 +1,5 @@
 /*******************************************************************************
- * Copyright (c) 2018 Eclipse RDF4J contributors, Aduna, and others.
+ * Copyright (c) 2020 Eclipse RDF4J contributors, Aduna, and others.

replies.bodyText: Updated the headers for the existing files e.g. changed back to 2018 from 2020 where these were alterred after grammar compilation ...
replies.author: damyan-ognyanov

replies.bodyText: updated the rest of the headers and squashed all commits into one

timeline.message:

Signed-off-by: damyan.ognyanov <damyan.ognyanov@ontotext.com>
